sentences.en: Besides cancer, smoking can lead on to other diseases.
sentences.cn: 除了癌症外, 吸烟还可引起其他疾病.

sentences.en: Besides English, he has to study German and French.
sentences.cn: 除英语外, 他还要学德语和法语.

sentences.en: Besides English, he has to study German.
sentences.cn: 除了英语, 他还要学德语.

sentences.en: Besides the acting being true to life, the singing was splendid.
sentences.cn: 不但动作十分逼真, 演唱也极为出色.

sentences.en: Besides the two novels, I have bought two atlases.
sentences.cn: 我买了两本小说, 另外还买了两本地图册.

sentences.en: He gave me a book, a pen and some money besides.
sentences.cn: 他给了我一本书, 一支钢笔,此外还给了我一些钱.

sentences.en: He had other people to take care of besides me.
sentences.cn: 除了我以外,他还需要照料其他人.

sentences.en: I don't like that new dictionary, besides, it's too expensive.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢那本新字典, 另外, 它也太贵.

sentences.en: I don't want to go; besides, I'm too tired.
sentences.cn: 我不想去, 再说我也太累了.

sentences.en: I have five other books besides this.
sentences.cn: 除这本以外,我还有五本别的书.

sentences.en: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.cn: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.en: I think she has many good qualities besides being very beautiful.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她不但长得非常漂亮，而且还有很多优秀品质。

sentences.en: The area has stunning scenery, beautiful beaches, and much more besides.
sentences.cn: 那个地方有迷人的景色、美丽的沙滩，除此之外还有很多很多。

sentences.en: There are other visitors besides me.
sentences.cn: 参观人除我之外,还有另外的人.

sentences.en: There were nine pounds left, besides some pennies.
sentences.cn: 除几枚便士硬币外,还剩下九英镑.

sentences.en: We have lots of things in common besides music.
sentences.cn: 除了音乐，我们还有很多共通点。

trans.tran_en: in addition to someone or something else that you are mentioning
